summary: Twin zoologists lose their wives in a car accident and become obsessed with decomposing animals.
cast: Andréa Ferréol|Brian Deacon|Eric Deacon|Frances Barber|Joss Ackland|Jim Davidson|Agnès Brulet|Guusje van Tilborgh|Gerard Thoolen|Ken Campbell|Wolf Kahler|Geoffrey Palmer|David Attenborough
title: Zoo
